description_for_human: Plan your wedding with AI. Get personalized advice on budgets, venues, timelines, vendors, and more.
description_for_model: Aisle is an AI wedding planner that helps couples plan their wedding through natural conversation. Users can ask about wedding budgets, timelines, vendor selection, guest management, seating charts, and day-of coordination. The AI provides personalized, practical advice in a warm and supportive tone.
